name: HOT WIRED (itch)
description:
Submission for the 2021 StraightUpGameJam.

Developed in UE4 by MCYeeticus, steevesm, and v_zibz.

Uses Driving Rock Sport by Infraction [No Copyright Music] ***Stream Safe***

Also uses the following assets from the Unreal marketplace:

https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/automotive-material-pack

https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/9c3fab270dfe468a9a920da0c...
